text: Cyrus Stevens Avery (1871â€“1963) was known as the "Father of Route 66". He created the route while a member of the federal board appointed to create the Federal Highway System, then pushed for the establishment of the U.S. Highway 66 Association to pave and promote the highway. ==References== Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:1871 births Category:1963 deaths
title: Cyrus Avery
